author: alex.g.t
content: is it not possible to get all validators, with all statuses? this <https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Beacon/getStateValidators> doesn t seem to have an available value for "all" or similar

author: mpetrunic
content:
query params are not required so not sending anything should return everything.
That said, those statuses are still being debated, you can chip in here: https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/pull/94

author: alex.g.t
content: thanks <@!545555441518772225>  , seems that is the case
